Name: Global ML Building Footprints
Purpose: Display building shapes on Bing Maps
Fields: 2D building footprint polygons, building height estimates

Name: OpenStreetMap
Fields: Points and building shapes, user-supplied building uses

Name: National Structure Inventory
Purpose: Evaluate potential consequences of natural and man-made hazards
Fields: Latitude/longitude points, building categories, damage categories

Name: USA Structures
Purpose: identifying buildings that may be affected by an emergency
Fields: Footprints, building categories (Building Occupancy Classification standard)

Name: LandScan
Purpose: "to address the need for improved estimates of population for consequence assessment."
